name: Reckless Need For Fast Speed Highway & Traffic Pursuit Racer - Best Free Hot Drag Racing Car Game
name_original: Reckless Need For Fast Speed Highway & Traffic Pursuit Racer - Best Free Hot Drag Racing Car Game
description:
Impressive drivers, and even more impressive cars. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride while you compete for the title of 'BEST DRIVER' in this new game!

This game features include:
-Top quality retina graphics!
-Exotic cars to choose from (Ferrari, Porsche, BMW)
-GameCenter capabilities to race against friends!
-Addictive arcade game system, endless hours of gameplay!

Don't wait now, download this game today!
